summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing a collective bargaining agreement between The City of Seattle and the Seattle Fire Chiefs Association, International Association of Fire Fighters, Local 2898, effective through August 31, 1988; fixing the compensation for Fire Battalion Chiefs and Fire Deputy Chiefs effective September 1, 1986 and September 1, 1987; revising certain benefits under, and City payments for, medical plan options available to nonrepresented Fire Deputy Chiefs; superseding inconsistent ordinances, and providing payment therefor.
